data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Darjiling, West Bengal, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Darjiling, West Bengal, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, 120,500 people live in the county of Darjiling. Please, give them 24 new simple churches this year.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Darjiling, West Bengal, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Darjiling, West Bengal, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Beg people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, help the church in the county of Darjiling to exponentially multiply disciples.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Darjiling, West Bengal, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.section_summary:
the county of Darjiling, West Bengal, India has a population of 120,500.

We estimate Darjiling has 1,326 people who might know Jesus, 1,462 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 117,712 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Darjiling, West Bengal, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.
